pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Python SDK for Igloo

## Getting startedInstall the library with pip:```pip install igloo-python```You can find detailed documentation and examples on how to use the library on [our official site](http://igloo.ooo/).## LicenseSee the [license](https://github.com/IglooCloud/igloo-python/blob/master/LICENSE.txt) file for license rights and limitations.
